scripts.build: next build --webpack && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild --skipWranglerConfigCheck && node scripts/generate-wrangler-config.mjs && node scripts/sync-production-secrets.mjs
scripts.build:local: next build --webpack && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild --skipWranglerConfigCheck && node scripts/generate-wrangler-config.mjs
scripts.d1:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 execute nano_banana_Dev --local --file=./db/migrations/0001_init.sql --config wrangler.dev.toml
scripts.d1:migrate:remote: npx wrangler d1 execute nano_banana_Dev --remote --file=./db/migrations/0001_init.sql --config wrangler.dev.toml
